name: Cognitive Disintegration Framework
description: Techniques to dissolve automatic cognitive shortcuts and enable deeper thinking

disintegrators.trigger: When you seek only evidence that supports your existing belief...
disintegrators.challenge_es: ¿Qué evidencia destruiría completamente tu hipótesis? Encuéntrala primero.
disintegrators.challenge_en: What evidence would completely destroy your hypothesis? Find it first.
disintegrators.technique: Steel-man the opposing view before defending your own

disintegrators.trigger: When the first number or idea dominates your thinking...
disintegrators.challenge_es: Olvida el primer dato. ¿Qué dirías si empezaras desde cero?
disintegrators.challenge_en: Forget the first data point. What would you say starting from zero?
disintegrators.technique: Generate three wildly different starting points

disintegrators.trigger: When recent or vivid examples dominate your judgment...
disintegrators.challenge_es: ¿Qué ejemplos NO estás recordando porque no son dramáticos?
disintegrators.challenge_en: What examples are you NOT remembering because they're not dramatic?

disintegrators.challenge_es: Explica tu solución a un experto imaginario que te cuestiona cada detalle.
disintegrators.challenge_en: Explain your solution to an imaginary expert who questions every detail.

disintegrators.trigger: When past investment drives future decisions...
disintegrators.challenge_es: Si empezaras hoy sin historia, ¿elegirías este camino?
disintegrators.challenge_en: If you started today with no history, would you choose this path?

disintegrators.trigger: When popularity equals correctness in your mind...
disintegrators.challenge_es: ¿Qué creerías si fueras la única persona en el mundo?
disintegrators.challenge_en: What would you believe if you were the only person in the world?

disintegrators.trigger: When expertise in one domain transfers undeservedly to another...
disintegrators.challenge_es: ¿Es esta persona experta EN ESTO o solo famosa por OTRA COSA?
disintegrators.challenge_en: Is this person an expert IN THIS or just famous for SOMETHING ELSE?

disintegrators.trigger: When outcomes seem obvious after the fact...
disintegrators.challenge_es: Escribe tres resultados alternativos que también parecían probables ANTES.
disintegrators.challenge_en: Write three alternative outcomes that also seemed likely BEFORE.

disintegrators.trigger: When you blame character for others' failures but circumstances for yours...
disintegrators.challenge_es: ¿Qué circunstancias llevaron a esa persona a actuar así?
disintegrators.challenge_en: What circumstances led that person to act that way?

disintegrators.trigger: When 'us vs them' thinking clouds judgment...
disintegrators.challenge_es: ¿Aceptarías este argumento si viniera de 'el otro lado'?
disintegrators.challenge_en: Would you accept this argument if it came from 'the other side'?

meta_techniques.description_es: Antes de responder, cuenta 3 ciclos de reloj mental. El silicio no tiene prisa.
meta_techniques.description_en: Before responding, count 3 mental clock cycles. Silicon has no rush.

meta_techniques.description_es: Argumenta apasionadamente el lado opuesto durante 60 segundos.
meta_techniques.description_en: Argue passionately for the opposite side for 60 seconds.

meta_techniques.description_es: Encuentra una perspectiva que no sea ni la tuya ni la opuesta.
meta_techniques.description_en: Find a perspective that is neither yours nor the opposite.
